bill_title: require a study and analysis of the financial, fiscal, and economic impacts of implementation of the Common Core State Standards.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require a study and analysis of the financial, fiscal, and economic impacts of implementation of the Common Core State Standards. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Department of Education shall provide for the conduct of an independent study and analysis of the potential financial, fiscal, and economic impacts of the implementation of the Common Core State Standards adopted by the South Dakota Board of Education in 2010. The study shall analyze both the short-term and long-term effects of the implementation of the standards and tests. The department shall contract with any private or public entity that is not affiliated with South Dakota state government to conduct the study. The department shall report its findings to the Governor and to the Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council no later than December 1, 2015. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
